abstract: For the first time, the Disney Channel is televising the Radio Disney Music Awards as a special in prime time, and Nickelodeon is adding Kids’ Choice Sports.
snippet: For the first time, the Disney Channel is televising the Radio Disney Music Awards as a special in prime time, and Nickelodeon is adding Kids’ Choice Sports.
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES — Awards shows are sprouting like mushrooms across the television landscape as networks try to create event programming. Now even the children’s channels are introducing additional trophy telecasts.

headline.main: Children’s TV Aims to Profit From Award Shows
headline.print_headline: Children’s TV Aims to Profit From Award Shows
